edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc
Class DocContentSummaryBuilder

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common.LSPContentSummaryBuilder
        |
        +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc.DocContentSummaryBuilder
public class DocContentSummaryBuilder
extends LSPContentSummaryBuilder

Saves and loads an LSPContentSummary as a flat STARTS XML file. It builds on its superclass, which already knows how to turn the STARTS XML file into a LSPContentSummary. In this package, the notion is that since the document collection is stored as text, so should its content summary.

The filename under which the content summary is persisted is always the same: it is a constant inside DocConstants.

The directory is the same place where the BackEndLSP that owns the LSPContentSummary keeps its doc_config.xml file: SDARTS_HOME/config/backEndLSPName
